articles.title: Adversarial Examples: Why Your Model’s Confidence Cannot Be Trusted
articles.excerpt: We live in a time where models pass the bar exam, generate photorealistic art, and write code that compiles while convincing product teams, venture capitalists, and sometimes even regulators that they “understand” the world.
